query.title: Query
query.description: The research query that was executed

workflow.title: Workflow
workflow.description: The workflow type used (direct, exploratory, synthesis)

query_type.title: Query Type
query_type.description: The detected query content type (documentation, code, academic, general)

query_type_description.title: Query Type Description
query_type_description.description: Human-readable description of the query type

successful_sources.title: Successful Sources
successful_sources.description: Number of sources that returned results

synthesis.title: Synthesis
synthesis.description: AI-generated synthesis of findings (synthesis workflow only)

urls_discovered.title: URLs Discovered
urls_discovered.description: List of source URLs consulted during research

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO timestamp of when research completed
